items.summary: In frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx, ensure the hero section contains an autoplaying, muted, looping <video> element that plays a library scene video. The video element must be absolutely positioned to fill the entire hero section (w-full h-full object-cover), placed behind all hero content via z-index layering. A semi-transparent dark overlay must sit between the video and the hero text content to preserve text readability. The video source must reference frontend/public/assets/generated/library-hero-bg.mp4. Set autoPlay, muted, loop, and playsInline attributes on the video element. If the video cannot play, the existing hero background image must serve as a fallback via the <video> poster attribute. All existing hero text, CTA buttons, and other content must remain fully visible and functional above the video.
